languages.text: "На меня даже не смотрите, Лорд-капитан. Я в этих "жреческих" штучках ни-че-гошеньки не смыслю. Прорицателем быть не нужно, чтобы сказать наверняка — полезу в чужой ритуал и мозги себе поджарю... Это если повезет! А если не повезет, поджарю мозги всем остальным. Так себе затейка, не правда ли?"

traits.locale_text: "На меня даже не смотрите, Лорд-капитан. Я в этих "жреческих" штучках ни-че-гошеньки не смыслю. Прорицателем быть не нужно, чтобы сказать наверняка — полезу в чужой ритуал и мозги себе поджарю... Это если повезет! А если не повезет, поджарю мозги всем остальным. Так себе затейка, не правда ли?"

languages.text: "Don't look at me, Lord Captain, I don't know the first thing about this priestly groxwash. It doesn't take a diviner to realise that I'd fry my brains if I tried to mess with some weird ritual... and that's if we were lucky. If we weren't so lucky, I'd end up frying everybody else's brains. Doesn't sound too promising, does it?"
languages.original_text: "На меня даже не смотрите, Лорд-капитан. Я в этих "жреческих" штучках ни-че-гошеньки не смыслю. Прорицателем быть не нужно, чтобы сказать наверняка — полезу в чужой ритуал и мозги себе поджарю... Это если повезет! А если не повезет, поджарю мозги всем остальным. Так себе затейка, не правда ли?"

traits.locale_text: "Don't even look at me, Lord Captain. I don't know the first thing about this priest-y hocus-pocus. You don't have to be a clairvoyant to say for sure that I would fry my own brains if I try to intervene in someone's ritual... at best. And at worst, I would fry the brains of everyone else. A rather bleak prospect, isn't it?"

"Don't even look at me, Lord Captain. I don't know the first thing about this priest-y hocus-pocus. You don't have to be a clairvoyant to say for sure that I would fry my own brains if I try to intervene in someone's ritual... at best. And at worst, I would fry the brains of everyone else. A rather bleak prospect, isn't it?"

"Don't even look at me, Lord Captain. I don't know the first thing about this priest-y hocus-pocus. You don't have to be a clairvoyant to say for sure that I would fry my brains if I try to intervene in someone's ritual... at best. And at worst, I would fry the brains of everyone else. A rather bleak prospect, isn't it?"

"Don't even look at me, Lord Captain. I don't know the first thing about this priest-y hocus-pocus. You don't have to be a clairvoyant to say for sure that I would fry my brains if I try to intervene in someone's ritual... at best. And at worst, I would fry the brains of everyone else. A rather bleak prospect, isn't it?"

"Don't look at me, Lord Captain, I don't know the first thing about this priestly groxwash. It doesn't take a diviner to realise that I'd fry my brains if I tried to mess with some weird ritual... and that's if we were lucky. If weren't not so lucky, I'd end up frying everybody else's brains. Doesn't sound too promising, does it?"

"Don't look at me, Lord Captain, I don't know the first thing about this priestly groxwash. It doesn't take a diviner to realise that I'd fry my brains if I tried to mess with some weird ritual... and that's if we were lucky. If we weren't so lucky, I'd end up frying everybody else's brains. Doesn't sound too promising, does it?"

"Don't look at me, Lord Captain, I don't know the first thing about this priestly groxwash. It doesn't take a diviner to realise that I'd fry my brains if I tried to mess with some weird ritual... and that's if we were lucky. If we weren't so lucky, I'd end up frying everybody else's brains. Doesn't sound too promising, does it?"

languages.text: «A mí ni me mire, Lord Capitán. Yo de religión no entiendo una mierda de grox. Pero no me hace falta ser clarividente para saber que intervenir en un ritual ajeno es una forma segura de acabar con los sesos fritos... en el mejor de los casos. Y en el peor, acabo friéndoselos yo a todos los presentes. Una perspectiva poco halagüeña, ¿no le parece?».
languages.original_text: "Don't look at me, Lord Captain, I don't know the first thing about this priestly groxwash. It doesn't take a diviner to realise that I'd fry my brains if I tried to mess with some weird ritual... and that's if we were lucky. If we weren't so lucky, I'd end up frying everybody else's brains. Doesn't sound too promising, does it?"

traits.locale_text: «A mí ni me mire, Lord Capitán. Yo no entiendo de esos abracadabras religiosos. No me hace falta ser clarividente para saber que intervenir en un ritual ajeno es una forma segura de acabar con los sesos fritos... en el mejor de los casos. Y en el peor, igual los frío yo a todos los presentes. Una perspectiva poco halagüeña, ¿no le parece?».

languages.text: “别看我，舰长大人，我对这个什么神谕之类的破玩意儿一无所知。如果我打算干涉别人的仪式，那恐怕根本不需预知未来的能力，就能知道我的脑子肯定会被炸开花……这还是运气好的情况。如果运气不好的话，我会把所有其他人的脑子都炸开花。听起来好像不怎么样，你说是吧？”
languages.original_text: "Don't look at me, Lord Captain, I don't know the first thing about this priestly groxwash. It doesn't take a diviner to realise that I'd fry my brains if I tried to mess with some weird ritual... and that's if we were lucky. If we weren't so lucky, I'd end up frying everybody else's brains. Doesn't sound too promising, does it?"

traits.locale_text: “别看我，舰长大人，我对这个什么神谕的把戏一无所知。如果我打算干涉别人的仪式，你恐怕根本不需预知未来的能力，就能知道我的脑子肯定会被炸烂，这还是最好的情况。最坏的情况是，我会把其他人的脑子都炸开花。无论是哪种结果，恐怕都不怎么样，你说呢？”
“别看我，舰长大人，我对这个什么神谕之类的破玩意儿一无所知。如果我打算干涉别人的仪式，那恐怕根本不需预知未来的能力，就能知道我的脑子肯定会被炸开花……这还是运气好的情况。如果运气不好的话，我会把所有其他人的脑子都炸开花。听起来好像不怎么样，你说是吧？”

languages.text: « Ne vous tournez pas vers moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, je ne connais rien à ces pratiques chamaniques. Pas la peine d'être voyant pour savoir que je me grillerais la cervelle si j'essayais d'intervenir dans un rituel bizarre... dans le meilleur des cas. Au pire, je grillerais la cervelle de tout le monde. Ça vous tente ? »
languages.original_text: "Don't look at me, Lord Captain, I don't know the first thing about this priestly groxwash. It doesn't take a diviner to realise that I'd fry my brains if I tried to mess with some weird ritual... and that's if we were lucky. If we weren't so lucky, I'd end up frying everybody else's brains. Doesn't sound too promising, does it?"

traits.locale_text: « Ne vous tournez pas vers moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, je ne connais rien à ces pratiques chamaniques. Pas la peine d'être voyant pour savoir que je me grillerais la cervelle si j'essayais d'intervenir dans un rituel bizarre... dans le meilleur des cas. Au pire, je grillerais la cervelle de tout le monde. Ça vous tente ? »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、私を見ないでちょうだい。私は、こいつらの司祭とやらが執り行うような儀式について何も知らないわ。遠見の力を持っていなくとも、妙な儀式に介入しようとすれば、私の脳みそが焼けることは間違いない…それでもまだ一番マシなのよ。最悪の場合、私は他の皆の脳を焼くことになるでしょうね。どう、あまりいい見通しではないでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "Don't look at me, Lord Captain, I don't know the first thing about this priestly groxwash. It doesn't take a diviner to realise that I'd fry my brains if I tried to mess with some weird ritual... and that's if we were lucky. If we weren't so lucky, I'd end up frying everybody else's brains. Doesn't sound too promising, does it?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、私を見ないでちょうだい。私は、こいつらの司祭とやらが執り行うような儀式について何も知らないわ。遠見の力を持っていなくとも、妙な儀式に介入しようとすれば、私の脳みそが焼けることは間違いない…それでもまだ一番マシなのよ。最悪の場合、私は他の皆の脳を焼くことになるでしょうね。どう、あまりいい見通しではないでしょう？」

languages.text: "Seht nicht mich an, Lord Captain. Ich habe keine Ahnung von diesem priesterlichen Hokuspokus. Man braucht keinen Seher, um zu erkennen, dass ich mein Hirn grillen würde, wenn ich in irgendein Ritual reinpfusche ... falls wir Glück haben. Falls nicht, würde ich das Hirn aller anderen gleich mitgrillen. Klingt nicht sonderlich verlockend, oder?"
languages.original_text: "Don't look at me, Lord Captain, I don't know the first thing about this priestly groxwash. It doesn't take a diviner to realise that I'd fry my brains if I tried to mess with some weird ritual... and that's if we were lucky. If we weren't so lucky, I'd end up frying everybody else's brains. Doesn't sound too promising, does it?"

traits.locale_text: "Blickt mich nicht an, Lord Captain. Ich weiß nicht das Geringste über diesen priesterlichen Hokuspokus. Man muss kein Hellseher sein, um mit Bestimmtheit sagen zu können, dass ich mir mein Hirn rösten würde, würde ich mich in irgendein Ritual einmischen ... bestenfalls. Und schlimmstenfalls würde ich allen das Hirn rösten. Keine schöne Vorstellung, nicht wahr?"

"Seht nicht mich an, Lord Captain. Ich habe keine Ahnung von diesem priesterlichen Hokuspokus. Man braucht keinen Seher, um zu erkennen, dass ich mein Hirn grillen würde, wenn ich in irgendein Ritual reinpfusche ... falls wir Glück haben. Falls nicht, würde ich das Hirn aller anderen gleich mitgrillen. Klingt nicht sonderlich verlockend, oder?"

languages.text: "Hiç bana bakma Lord Kaptan. Bu groks saçması rahiplik hakkında en ufak bir fikrim yok. Tuhaf ayinlerle uğraşmaya kalkışırsam beynimden geriye hiçbir şey kalmayacağını anlamam için kâhin olmama gerek yok. Bu da şansımız yaver giderse tabii ki. Şansımız yaver gitmezse kimsede beyin meyin bırakmam. Çok da umut vadetmiyor, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Don't look at me, Lord Captain, I don't know the first thing about this priestly groxwash. It doesn't take a diviner to realise that I'd fry my brains if I tried to mess with some weird ritual... and that's if we were lucky. If we weren't so lucky, I'd end up frying everybody else's brains. Doesn't sound too promising, does it?"
